 Khonkolor:
"IT'S TIME TO THE SHOW!!!!" shouted the male and fired against Bongiovi (12 shots)
  KSLawdogg@... wrote: The small arena that the two combatants are in is dome shaped with no obvious 
exits except for the stadium-style seats the diverse alien spectators sit and 
prepare to watch the match.  The combatants could easily attempt to leave if 
they wanted.

Over the loudspeaker of this small arena, the official begins.  "This match 
between Bongiovi and Khonkolor is non-lethal.  The loser will be whoever 
yields first.  Begin the battle!"
